;;;924      GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_50MHz;

;;;925      GPIO_Init(GPIOA, &GPIO_InitStructure);

;;;927      /* Configure USART1 Rx (PA.10) as input floating */
;;;928      GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = GPIO_Pin_10;

;;;840    *******************************************************************************/
;;;841    void RCC_Configuration(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;842    {
;;;843      /* RCC system reset(for debug purpose) */
;;;844      RCC_DeInit();
000002  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_DeInit
;;;845    
;;;846      /* Enable HSE */
;;;847      RCC_HSEConfig(RCC_HSE_ON);

;;;848    
;;;849      /* Wait till HSE is ready */
;;;850      HSEStartUpStatus = RCC_WaitForHSEStartUp();

;;;851    
;;;852      if(HSEStartUpStatus == SUCCESS)
000016  4608              MOV      r0,r1

00001c  d126              BNE      |L3.108|
;;;853      {
;;;854        /* HCLK = SYSCLK */
;;;855        RCC_HCLKConfig(RCC_SYSCLK_Div1); 
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000020  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_HCLKConfig
;;;856      
;;;857        /* PCLK2 = HCLK */
;;;858        RCC_PCLK2Config(RCC_HCLK_Div1); 
000024  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000026  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_PCLK2Config
;;;859    
;;;860        /* PCLK1 = HCLK/2 */
;;;861        RCC_PCLK1Config(RCC_HCLK_Div2);
00002a  f44f6080          MOV      r0,#0x400
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_PCLK1Config
;;;862    
;;;863        /* Flash 2 wait state */
;;;864        FLASH_SetLatency(FLASH_Latency_2);
000032  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000034  f7fffffe          BL       FLASH_SetLatency
;;;865        /* Enable Prefetch Buffer */
;;;866        FLASH_PrefetchBufferCmd(FLASH_PrefetchBuffer_Enable);
000038  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       FLASH_PrefetchBufferCmd
;;;867    
;;;868        /* PLLCLK = 8MHz * 9 = 72 MHz */
;;;869        RCC_PLLConfig(RCC_PLLSource_HSE_Div1, RCC_PLLMul_9);
00003e  f44f11e0          MOV      r1,#0x1c0000

;;;870    
;;;871        /* Enable PLL */ 
;;;872        RCC_PLLCmd(ENABLE);

;;;873    
;;;874        /* Wait till PLL is ready */
;;;875        while(RCC_GetFlagStatus(RCC_FLAG_PLLRDY) == RESET)

00005a  d0fa              BEQ      |L3.82|
;;;876        {
;;;877        }
;;;878    
;;;879        /* Select PLL as system clock source */
;;;880        RCC_SYSCLKConfig(RCC_SYSCLKSource_PLLCLK);

;;;881    
;;;882        /* Wait till PLL is used as system clock source */
;;;883        while(RCC_GetSYSCLKSource() != 0x08)

;;;884        {

                  USART_Configuration PROC
;;;939    *******************************************************************************/
;;;940    void USART_Configuration(void)
000000  b500              PUSH     {lr}
;;;941    {
000002  b087              SUB      sp,sp,#0x1c
;;;942      USART_InitTypeDef USART_InitStructure;
;;;943      USART_ClockInitTypeDef  USART_ClockInitStructure;
;;;944    /* USART1 configuration -----------------------------------------------
;;;945    
;;;946    -------*/
;;;947      /* USART1 configured as follow:
;;;948            - BaudRate = 115200 baud  
;;;949            - Word Length = 8 Bits
;;;950            - One Stop Bit
;;;951            - No parity
;;;952            - Hardware flow control disabled (RTS and CTS signals)
;;;953            - Receive and transmit enabled
;;;954            - USART Clock disabled
;;;955            - USART CPOL: Clock is active low
;;;956            - USART CPHA: Data is captured on the middle 
;;;957            - USART LastBit: The clock pulse of the last data bit is not 
;;;958    
;;;959    output to 
;;;960                             the SCLK pin
;;;961      */
;;;962    USART_ClockInitStructure.USART_Clock = USART_Clock_Disable;
000004  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000008  f8ad0004          STRH     r0,[sp,#4]
;;;963    USART_ClockInitStructure.USART_CPOL = USART_CPOL_Low;
00000c  f8ad0006          STRH     r0,[sp,#6]
;;;964    USART_ClockInitStructure.USART_CPHA = USART_CPHA_2Edge;
000010  f44f7000          MOV      r0,#0x200
000014  f8ad0008          STRH     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;965    USART_ClockInitStructure.USART_LastBit = USART_LastBit_Disable;
000018  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00001c  f8ad000a          STRH     r0,[sp,#0xa]
;;;966    /* Configure the USART1 synchronous paramters */
;;;967    USART_ClockInit(USART1, &USART_ClockInitStructure);
000020  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000022  480f              LDR      r0,|L4.96|
000024  f7fffffe          BL       USART_ClockInit
;;;968    
;;;969    USART_InitStructure.USART_BaudRate = 115200;
000028  f44f30e1          MOV      r0,#0x1c200
00002c  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;970    USART_InitStructure.USART_WordLength = USART_WordLength_8b;
00002e  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000032  f8ad0010          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;971    USART_InitStructure.USART_StopBits = USART_StopBits_1;
000036  f8ad0012          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x12]
;;;972    USART_InitStructure.USART_Parity = USART_Parity_No ;
00003a  f8ad0014          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;973    USART_InitStructure.USART_HardwareFlowControl = 
00003e  f8ad0018          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;974    
;;;975    USART_HardwareFlowControl_None;
;;;976    
;;;977    
;;;978    USART_InitStructure.USART_Mode = USART_Mode_Rx | USART_Mode_Tx;
000042  f04f000c          MOV      r0,#0xc
000046  f8ad0016          STRH     r0,[sp,#0x16]
;;;979    /* Configure USART1 basic and asynchronous paramters */
;;;980    USART_Init(USART1, &USART_InitStructure);
00004a  a903              ADD      r1,sp,#0xc
00004c  4804              LDR      r0,|L4.96|
00004e  f7fffffe          BL       USART_Init
;;;981        
;;;982      /* Enable USART1 */
;;;983      USART_Cmd(USART1, ENABLE);
000052  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000054  4802              LDR      r0,|L4.96|
000056  f7fffffe          BL       USART_Cmd
;;;984    }
00005a  b007              ADD      sp,sp,#0x1c
00005c  bd00              POP      {pc}
;;;985    
                          ENDP

00005e  0000              DCW      0x0000

                  adjust_error_handling PROC
;;;504    
;;;505    int adjust_error_handling(
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;506    int args,
;;;507    int * print_stack,
;;;508    int * do_next)
;;;509    {

;;;512    
;;;513        for(;;)

;;;514        {
;;;515            fprintf(stderr, "enter a number:\r\n");

00000e  4840              LDR      r0,|L5.272|

;;;516            fprintf(stderr, "1 = done with error handling\r\n");

;;;517            fprintf(stderr, "2 = %sprint stack on error\r\n",

;;;518                ((*print_stack IS ON) ? "do not " : ""));

;;;519            if (args IS 3)
000032  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
000034  d10b              BNE      |L5.78|
;;;520            {
;;;521                if (*do_next IS 0)                    /* 0 means continue */

;;;522                    fprintf(stderr,
00003a  a149              ADR      r1,|L5.352|

000042  e019              B        |L5.120|
                  |L5.68|
;;;523                        "3 = stop on error (do not continue)\r\n");
;;;524                else                                  /* if do_next IS 2 -- 2 means stopping on error */
;;;525                    fprintf(stderr,

000046  4832              LDR      r0,|L5.272|
000048  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
00004c  e014              B        |L5.120|
                  |L5.78|
;;;526                        "3 = continue on error (do not stop)\r\n");
;;;527            }
;;;528            else if (args IS 2)
00004e  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
000050  d112              BNE      |L5.120|
;;;529            {
;;;530                if (*do_next IS 0)                    /* 0 means continue */
000052  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]
000054  b920              CBNZ     r0,|L5.96|
;;;531                    fprintf(stderr,

;;;533                else if (*do_next IS 1)               /* 1 means MDI */

;;;534                    fprintf(stderr,

                  |L5.112|

;;;537                    fprintf(stderr,

000074  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf

;;;548            else if ((choice IS 3) AND (args IS 3))

0000da  d109              BNE      |L5.240|
;;;551                *do_next SET_TO ((*do_next IS 2) ? 0 : (*do_next + 1));

;;;553        return 0;

000230  6f70206f
000234  72206d64
000238  69290d0a
00023c  00      
00023d  00                DCB      0
00023e  00                DCB      0
00023f  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.576|
000240  656e7465          DCB      "enter choice => ",0
000244  72206368
000248  6f696365
00024c  203d3e20
000250  00      
000251  00                DCB      0
000252  00                DCB      0
000253  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.596|
000254  256400            DCB      "%d",0
000257  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.designate_parameter_file||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_s
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                  designate_parameter_file PROC
;;;452    
;;;453    int designate_parameter_file(char * file_name)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;454    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;455        FILE * test_port;
;;;456    
;;;457        fprintf(stderr, "name of parameter file => ");
000004  a10c              ADR      r1,|L6.56|
000006  4813              LDR      r0,|L6.84|
000008  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;458        gets(file_name);
00000c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       gets
;;;459        test_port SET_TO fopen(file_name, "r");
000012  a111              ADR      r1,|L6.88|
000014  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000016  f7fffffe          BL       fopen
00001a  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;460        if (test_port IS NULL)
00001c  b935              CBNZ     r5,|L6.44|
;;;461        {
;;;462            fprintf(stderr, "Cannot open %s\r\n", file_name);
00001e  4622              MOV      r2,r4
000020  a10e              ADR      r1,|L6.92|
000022  480c              LDR      r0,|L6.84|
000024  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;463            return 1;
000028  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
                  |L6.42|
;;;464        }
;;;465        fclose(test_port);
;;;466        return 0;
;;;467    }
00002a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L6.44|
00002c  4628              MOV      r0,r5                 ;465
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       fclose
000032  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;466
000034  e7f9              B        |L6.42|
;;;468    
                          ENDP

000036  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L6.56|
000038  6e616d65          DCB      "name of parameter file => ",0
00003c  206f6620
000040  70617261
000044  6d657465
000048  72206669
00004c  6c65203d
000050  3e2000  
000053  00                DCB      0
                  |L6.84|
                          DCD      __stderr
                  |L6.88|
000058  7200              DCB      "r",0
00005a  00                DCB      0
00005b  00                DCB      0
                  |L6.92|
00005c  43616e6e          DCB      "Cannot open %s\r\n",0
000060  6f74206f
000064  70656e20
000068  25730d0a
00006c  00      
00006d  00                DCB      0
00006e  00                DCB      0
00006f  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.fputc||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  fputc PROC
;;;992    *******************************************************************************/
;;;993    int fputc(int ch, FILE *f)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;994    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;995      /* Place your implementation of fputc here */
;;;996      /* e.g. write a character to the USART */
;;;997      USART_SendData(USART1, (u8) ch);
000006  b2e1              UXTB     r1,r4
000008  4805              LDR      r0,|L7.32|
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       USART_SendData
;;;998    
;;;999      /* Loop until the end of transmission */
;;;1000     while(USART_GetFlagStatus(USART1, USART_FLAG_TC) == RESET)
00000e  bf00              NOP      
                  |L7.16|
000010  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
000012  4803              LDR      r0,|L7.32|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       USART_GetFlagStatus
000018  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00001a  d0f9              BEQ      |L7.16|
;;;1001     {
;;;1002     }
;;;1003   
;;;1004     return ch;
00001c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
;;;1005   }
00001e  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1006   
                          ENDP

                  |L7.32|
                          DCD      0x40013800

                          AREA ||i.interpret_from_file||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  interpret_from_file PROC
;;;258    
;;;259    int interpret_from_file(                          /* ARGUMENTS                  */
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;260    int do_next,                                      /* what to do if error        */
;;;261    int block_delete,                                 /* switch which is ON or OFF  */
;;;262    int print_stack)                                  /* option which is ON or OFF  */
;;;263    {
000002  b0c1              SUB      sp,sp,#0x104
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4617              MOV      r7,r2
;;;264        int status;
;;;265        char line[RS274NGC_TEXT_SIZE];
;;;266    
;;;267        for(; ;)
00000a  bf00              NOP      
                  |L8.12|
;;;268        {
;;;269            status SET_TO rs274ngc_read(NULL);
00000c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_read
000012  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;270            if ((status IS RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH) AND (block_delete IS ON))
000014  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
000016  d102              BNE      |L8.30|
000018  2e01              CMP      r6,#1
00001a  d100              BNE      |L8.30|
;;;271                continue;
00001c  e7f6              B        |L8.12|
                  |L8.30|
;;;272            else if (status IS RS274NGC_ENDFILE)
00001e  2c03              CMP      r4,#3
000020  d100              BNE      |L8.36|
;;;273                break;
000022  e055              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.36|
;;;274            if ((status ISNT RS274NGC_OK) AND         // should not be EXIT
000024  2c00              CMP      r4,#0
000026  d027              BEQ      |L8.120|
;;;275                (status ISNT RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH))
000028  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
00002a  d025              BEQ      |L8.120|
;;;276            {
;;;277                report_error(status, print_stack);
00002c  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00002e  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000030  f7fffffe          BL       report_error
;;;278                if ((status IS NCE_FILE_ENDED_WITH_NO_PERCENT_SIGN) OR
000034  2c50              CMP      r4,#0x50
000036  d001              BEQ      |L8.60|
;;;279                    (do_next IS 2))                   /* 2 means stop */
000038  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
00003a  d103              BNE      |L8.68|
                  |L8.60|
;;;280                {
;;;281                    status SET_TO 1;
00003c  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
000040  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;282                    break;
000042  e045              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.68|
;;;283                }
;;;284                else if (do_next IS 1)                /* 1 means MDI */
000044  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
000046  d116              BNE      |L8.118|
;;;285                {
;;;286                    fprintf(stderr, "starting MDI\r\n");
000048  a125              ADR      r1,|L8.224|
00004a  4829              LDR      r0,|L8.240|
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;287                    interpret_from_keyboard(block_delete, print_stack);
000050  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000052  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000054  f7fffffe          BL       interpret_from_keyboard
;;;288                    fprintf(stderr, "continue program? y/n =>");
000058  a126              ADR      r1,|L8.244|
00005a  4825              LDR      r0,|L8.240|
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;289                    gets(line);
000060  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
000062  f7fffffe          BL       gets
;;;290                    if (line[0] ISNT 'y')
000066  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00006a  2879              CMP      r0,#0x79
00006c  d002              BEQ      |L8.116|
;;;291                    {
;;;292                        status SET_TO 1;
00006e  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000070  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;293                        break;
000072  e02d              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.116|
;;;294                    }
;;;295                    else
;;;296                        continue;
000074  e7ca              B        |L8.12|
                  |L8.118|
;;;297                }
;;;298                else                                  /* if do_next IS 0 -- 0 means continue */
;;;299                    continue;
000076  e7c9              B        |L8.12|
                  |L8.120|
;;;300            }
;;;301            status SET_TO rs274ngc_execute();
000078  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_execute
00007c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;302            if ((status ISNT RS274NGC_OK) AND
00007e  b31c              CBZ      r4,|L8.200|
;;;303                (status ISNT RS274NGC_EXIT) AND
000080  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
000082  d021              BEQ      |L8.200|
;;;304                (status ISNT RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH))
000084  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
000086  d01f              BEQ      |L8.200|
;;;305            {
;;;306                report_error(status, print_stack);
000088  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00008a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00008c  f7fffffe          BL       report_error
;;;307                status SET_TO 1;
000090  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
000094  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;308                if (do_next IS 1)                     /* 1 means MDI */
000096  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
000098  d113              BNE      |L8.194|
;;;309                {
;;;310                    fprintf(stderr, "starting MDI\r\n");
00009a  a111              ADR      r1,|L8.224|
00009c  4814              LDR      r0,|L8.240|
00009e  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;311                    interpret_from_keyboard(block_delete, print_stack);
0000a2  4639              MOV      r1,r7
0000a4  4630              MOV      r0,r6
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       interpret_from_keyboard
;;;312                    fprintf(stderr, "continue program? y/n =>");
0000aa  a112              ADR      r1,|L8.244|
0000ac  4810              LDR      r0,|L8.240|
0000ae  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;313                    gets(line);
0000b2  a801              ADD      r0,sp,#4
0000b4  f7fffffe          BL       gets
;;;314                    if (line[0] ISNT 'y')
0000b8  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
0000bc  2879              CMP      r0,#0x79
0000be  d006              BEQ      |L8.206|
;;;315                        break;
0000c0  e006              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.194|
;;;316                }
;;;317                else if (do_next IS 2)                /* 2 means stop */
0000c2  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
0000c4  d103              BNE      |L8.206|
;;;318                    break;
0000c6  e003              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.200|
;;;319            }
;;;320            else if (status IS RS274NGC_EXIT)
0000c8  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
0000ca  d100              BNE      |L8.206|
;;;321                break;
0000cc  e000              B        |L8.208|
                  |L8.206|
0000ce  e79d              B        |L8.12|
                  |L8.208|
0000d0  bf00              NOP                            ;273
;;;322        }
;;;323        return ((status IS 1) ? 1 : 0);
0000d2  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
0000d4  d102              BNE      |L8.220|
0000d6  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
                  |L8.216|
;;;324    }
0000d8  b041              ADD      sp,sp,#0x104
0000da  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
                  |L8.220|
0000dc  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;323
0000de  e7fb              B        |L8.216|
;;;325    
                          ENDP

                  |L8.224|
0000e0  73746172          DCB      "starting MDI\r\n",0
0000e4  74696e67
0000e8  204d4449
0000ec  0d0a00  
0000ef  00                DCB      0
                  |L8.240|
                          DCD      __stderr
                  |L8.244|
0000f4  636f6e74          DCB      "continue program? y/n =>",0
0000f8  696e7565
0000fc  2070726f
000100  6772616d
000104  3f20792f
000108  6e203d3e
00010c  00      
00010d  00                DCB      0
00010e  00                DCB      0
00010f  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.interpret_from_keyboard||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  interpret_from_keyboard PROC
;;;165    
;;;166    int interpret_from_keyboard(                      /* ARGUMENTS                 */
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;167    int block_delete,                                 /* switch which is ON or OFF */
;;;168    int print_stack)                                  /* option which is ON or OFF */
;;;169    {
000004  b0c0              SUB      sp,sp,#0x100
000006  4607              MOV      r7,r0
000008  4688              MOV      r8,r1
;;;170        char line[RS274NGC_TEXT_SIZE];
;;;171        int status;
;;;172    	char temp;
;;;173    	u16 count=0;
00000a  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00000e  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;174    
;;;175        for(; ;)
000010  bf00              NOP      
                  |L9.18|
;;;176        {
;;;177    		while(1)
000012  e02b              B        |L9.108|
                  |L9.20|
;;;178    		{	
;;;179    			temp =  _nc_code_buffer[gNowChar];
000014  482b              LDR      r0,|L9.196|
000016  492c              LDR      r1,|L9.200|
000018  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; gNowChar
00001a  5c45              LDRB     r5,[r0,r1]
;;;180    			gNowChar = gNowChar + 1;
00001c  482a              LDR      r0,|L9.200|
00001e  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; gNowChar
000020  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000024  4928              LDR      r1,|L9.200|
000026  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; gNowChar
;;;181    			if(gNowChar<strlen(_nc_code_buffer))
000028  4826              LDR      r0,|L9.196|
00002a  f7fffffe          BL       strlen
00002e  4926              LDR      r1,|L9.200|
000030  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; gNowChar
000032  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000034  d91a              BLS      |L9.108|
;;;182    			{
;;;183    				if(temp=='%')
000036  2d25              CMP      r5,#0x25
000038  d100              BNE      |L9.60|
;;;184    				{
;;;185    					//整段结束
;;;186    					break;
00003a  e018              B        |L9.110|
                  |L9.60|
;;;187    				}
;;;188    				else
;;;189    				{
;;;190    					if(temp==';')
00003c  2d3b              CMP      r5,#0x3b
00003e  d10e              BNE      |L9.94|
;;;191    					{
;;;192    						for(;count<RS274NGC_TEXT_SIZE;count++)			
000040  e007              B        |L9.82|
                  |L9.66|
;;;193    						{
;;;194    							line[count]='\0';
000042  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000046  f80d0006          STRB     r0,[sp,r6]
00004a  f1060001          ADD      r0,r6,#1              ;192
00004e  b280              UXTH     r0,r0                 ;192
000050  4606              MOV      r6,r0                 ;192
                  |L9.82|
000052  2eff              CMP      r6,#0xff              ;192
000054  ddf5              BLE      |L9.66|
;;;195    						}
;;;196    						count=0;
000056  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
00005a  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;197    						break;
00005c  e007              B        |L9.110|
                  |L9.94|
;;;198    					}
;;;199    					else
;;;200    					{
;;;201    						line[count++]=temp;
00005e  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000060  f1060101          ADD      r1,r6,#1
000064  b289              UXTH     r1,r1
000066  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000068  f80d5000          STRB     r5,[sp,r0]
                  |L9.108|
00006c  e7d2              B        |L9.20|
                  |L9.110|
00006e  bf00              NOP                            ;186
;;;202    					}
;;;203    				}
;;;204    			}
;;;205    		}
;;;206            if (strcmp (line, "quit") IS 0)
000070  a116              ADR      r1,|L9.204|
000072  4668              MOV      r0,sp
000074  f7fffffe          BL       strcmp
000078  b918              CBNZ     r0,|L9.130|
;;;207                return 0;
00007a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;208            status SET_TO rs274ngc_read(line);
;;;209            if ((status IS RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH) AND (block_delete IS ON));
;;;210            else if (status IS RS274NGC_ENDFILE);
;;;211            else if ((status ISNT RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH) AND
;;;212                (status ISNT RS274NGC_OK))
;;;213                report_error(status, print_stack);
;;;214            else
;;;215            {
;;;216                status SET_TO rs274ngc_execute();    
;;;217                if ((status IS RS274NGC_EXIT) OR
;;;218                    (status IS RS274NGC_EXECUTE_FINISH));
;;;219                else if (status ISNT RS274NGC_OK)
;;;220                    report_error(status, print_stack);
;;;221            }
;;;222        }
;;;223    }
00007c  b040              ADD      sp,sp,#0x100
00007e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
                  |L9.130|
000082  4668              MOV      r0,sp                 ;208
000084  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_read
000088  4604              MOV      r4,r0                 ;208
00008a  2c02              CMP      r4,#2                 ;209
00008c  d101              BNE      |L9.146|
00008e  2f01              CMP      r7,#1                 ;209
000090  d0bf              BEQ      |L9.18|
                  |L9.146|
000092  2c03              CMP      r4,#3                 ;210
000094  d0bd              BEQ      |L9.18|
000096  2c02              CMP      r4,#2                 ;211
000098  d005              BEQ      |L9.166|
00009a  b124              CBZ      r4,|L9.166|
00009c  4641              MOV      r1,r8                 ;213
00009e  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;213
0000a0  f7fffffe          BL       report_error
0000a4  e7b5              B        |L9.18|
                  |L9.166|
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_execute
0000aa  4604              MOV      r4,r0                 ;216
0000ac  2c01              CMP      r4,#1                 ;217
0000ae  d0b0              BEQ      |L9.18|
0000b0  2c02              CMP      r4,#2                 ;218
0000b2  d0ae              BEQ      |L9.18|
0000b4  2c00              CMP      r4,#0                 ;219
0000b6  d0ac              BEQ      |L9.18|
0000b8  4641              MOV      r1,r8                 ;220
0000ba  4620              MOV      r0,r4                 ;220
0000bc  f7fffffe          BL       report_error
0000c0  e7a7              B        |L9.18|
;;;224    
                          ENDP

0000c2  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L9.196|
                          DCD      _nc_code_buffer
                  |L9.200|
                          DCD      gNowChar
                  |L9.204|
0000cc  71756974          DCB      "quit",0
0000d0  00      
0000d1  00                DCB      0
0000d2  00                DCB      0
0000d3  00                DCB      0

                          AREA ||i.main||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_s
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                  main PROC
;;;654    
;;;655    int main(int argc, char ** argv)
000000  e92d43f0          PUSH     {r4-r9,lr}
;;;656    {  
000004  b0a1              SUB      sp,sp,#0x84
000006  4607              MOV      r7,r0
000008  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;657    /******************************RS274NGC之变量声明部分开始******************************/
;;;658    	int status;
;;;659    	int choice;
;;;660    	int do_next;                                  /* 0=continue, 1=mdi, 2=stop */
;;;661    	int block_delete;
;;;662    	int tool_flag;
;;;663    	int gees[RS274NGC_ACTIVE_G_CODES];
;;;664    	int ems[RS274NGC_ACTIVE_M_CODES];
;;;665    	double sets[RS274NGC_ACTIVE_SETTINGS];
;;;666    	char default_name[] SET_TO "rs274ngc.var";
00000a  a357              ADR      r3,|L10.360|
00000c  cb0f              LDM      r3,{r0-r3}
00000e  ac02              ADD      r4,sp,#8
000010  c40f              STM      r4!,{r0-r3}
;;;667    	int print_stack;
;;;668    /******************************RS274NGC之变量声明部分结束******************************/	
;;;669    	
;;;670    	
;;;671       
;;;672       
;;;673    #ifdef DEBUG
;;;674      debug();
;;;675    #endif
;;;676    
;;;677    	/* Configure the system clocks */
;;;678    	RCC_Configuration();
000012  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_Configuration
;;;679    	
;;;680    	/* NVIC Configuration */
;;;681    	NVIC_Configuration();
000016  f7fffffe          BL       NVIC_Configuration
;;;682    	
;;;683    	/* Configure the GPIOs */
;;;684    	GPIO_Configuration();
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_Configuration
;;;685    	
;;;686    	/* Configure the USART1 */
;;;687    	USART_Configuration();
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       USART_Configuration
;;;688    	
;;;689    	
;;;690    	//printf("\r\n Welcome to www.PowerAVR.com \r\n");
;;;691    	//printf("\r\n Please Input Character From Keyboard \r\n");
;;;692    
;;;693        
;;;694    /******************************RS274/NGC源码的main函数开始******************************/
;;;695      	/*
;;;696    	if (argc > 3)
;;;697    	{
;;;698    	    fprintf(stderr, "Usage \"%s\"\r\n", argv[0]);
;;;699    	    fprintf(stderr, "   or \"%s <input file>\"\r\n", argv[0]);
;;;700    	    fprintf(stderr, "   or \"%s <input file> <output file>\"\r\n", argv[0])
;;;701    	    //exit(1);
;;;702    		return 1;
;;;703    	}
;;;704    	*/
;;;705    	choice=1;
000022  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
000026  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;706    
;;;707    	do_next SET_TO 2;                             /* 2=stop */
000028  f04f0002          MOV      r0,#2
00002c  901f              STR      r0,[sp,#0x7c]
;;;708    	block_delete SET_TO OFF;
00002e  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000032  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;709    	print_stack SET_TO OFF;
000034  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;710    	tool_flag SET_TO 0;
000036  4680              MOV      r8,r0
;;;711    	strcpy(_parameter_file_name, default_name);
000038  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
00003a  484f              LDR      r0,|L10.376|
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       strcpy
;;;712    	_outfile SET_TO stdout;                       /* may be reset below */
000040  484e              LDR      r0,|L10.380|
000042  494f              LDR      r1,|L10.384|
000044  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; _outfile
;;;713    	
;;;714    	for(; ;)
000046  bf00              NOP      
                  |L10.72|
;;;715    	{
;;;716    	    fprintf(stderr, "\r\nenter a number:\r\n");
000048  a14e              ADR      r1,|L10.388|
00004a  4853              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
00004c  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;717    	    fprintf(stderr, "1 = start interpreting\r\n");
000050  a152              ADR      r1,|L10.412|
000052  4851              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
000054  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;718    	    fprintf(stderr, "2 = choose parameter file ...\r\n");
000058  a157              ADR      r1,|L10.440|
00005a  484f              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;719    	    fprintf(stderr, "3 = read tool file ...\r\n");
000060  a15d              ADR      r1,|L10.472|
000062  484d              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
000064  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;720    	    fprintf(stderr, "4 = turn block delete switch %s\r\n",
000068  b90e              CBNZ     r6,|L10.110|
;;;721    	        ((block_delete IS OFF) ? "ON" : "OFF"));
00006a  a062              ADR      r0,|L10.500|
00006c  e000              B        |L10.112|
                  |L10.110|
00006e  a062              ADR      r0,|L10.504|
                  |L10.112|
000070  4602              MOV      r2,r0
000072  a162              ADR      r1,|L10.508|
000074  4848              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
000076  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;722    	    fprintf(stderr, "5 = adjust error handling...\r\n");
00007a  a169              ADR      r1,|L10.544|
00007c  4846              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
00007e  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;723    	    fprintf(stderr, "enter choice => 1\r\n");
000082  a16f              ADR      r1,|L10.576|
000084  4844              LDR      r0,|L10.408|
000086  f7fffffe          BL       __2fprintf
;;;724    	    //gets(buffer);
;;;725    	    //if (sscanf(buffer, "%d", &choice) ISNT 1)
;;;726    	    //    continue;
;;;727    	    if (choice IS 1)
00008a  2c01              CMP      r4,#1
00008c  d100              BNE      |L10.144|
;;;728    	        break;
00008e  e028              B        |L10.226|
                  |L10.144|
;;;729    	    else if (choice IS 2)
000090  2c02              CMP      r4,#2
000092  d108              BNE      |L10.166|
;;;730    	    {
;;;731    	        if (designate_parameter_file(_parameter_file_name) ISNT 0)
000094  4838              LDR      r0,|L10.376|
000096  f7fffffe          BL       designate_parameter_file
00009a  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00009c  d0d4              BEQ      |L10.72|
;;;732    				return 1;
00009e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
                  |L10.160|
;;;733    /*	            exit(1);*/
;;;734    	    }
;;;735    	    else if (choice IS 3)
;;;736    	    {
;;;737    	        if (read_tool_file("") ISNT 0)
;;;738    				return 1;
;;;739    /*	            exit(1);*/
;;;740    	        tool_flag SET_TO 1;
;;;741    	    }
;;;742    	    else if (choice IS 4)
;;;743    	        block_delete SET_TO ((block_delete IS OFF) ? ON : OFF);
;;;744    	    else if (choice IS 5)
;;;745    	        adjust_error_handling(argc, &print_stack, &do_next);
;;;746    	}
;;;747    	fprintf(stderr, "executing\r\n");
;;;748    	if (tool_flag IS 0)
;;;749    	{
;;;750    	    if (read_tool_file("rs274ngc.tool_default") ISNT 0)
;;;751    			return 1;
;;;752    /*	        exit(1);*/
;;;753    	}
;;;754    	
;;;755    	if (argc IS 3)
;;;756    	{
;;;757    	    _outfile SET_TO fopen(argv[2], "w");
;;;758    	    if (_outfile IS NULL)
;;;759    	    {
;;;760    	        fprintf(stderr, "could not open output file %s\r\n", argv[2]);
;;;761    			return 1;
;;;762    /*	        exit(1);*/
;;;763    	    }
;;;764    	}
;;;765    	
;;;766    	if ((status SET_TO rs274ngc_init()) ISNT RS274NGC_OK)
;;;767    	{
;;;768    	    report_error(status, print_stack);
;;;769    		return 1;
;;;770    /*	    exit(1);*/
;;;771    	}
;;;772    	
;;;773    //	if (argc IS 1)
;;;774    	    status SET_TO interpret_from_keyboard(block_delete, print_stack);
;;;775    //	else                                          /* if (argc IS 2 or argc IS 3) */
;;;776    //	{
;;;777    //	    status SET_TO rs274ngc_open(argv[1]);
;;;778    //	    if (status ISNT RS274NGC_OK)              /* do not need to close since not open */
;;;779    //	    {
;;;780    //	        report_error(status, print_stack);
;;;781    //			return 1;
;;;782    ///*	        exit(1);*/
;;;783    //	    }
;;;784    //	    status SET_TO interpret_from_file(do_next, block_delete, print_stack);
;;;785    //	    rs274ngc_file_name(buffer, 5);            /* called to exercise the function */
;;;786    //	    rs274ngc_file_name(buffer, 79);           /* called to exercise the function */
;;;787    //	    rs274ngc_close();
;;;788    //	}
;;;789    	rs274ngc_line_length();                       /* called to exercise the function */
;;;790    	rs274ngc_sequence_number();                   /* called to exercise the function */
;;;791    	rs274ngc_active_g_codes(gees);                /* called to exercise the function */
;;;792    	rs274ngc_active_m_codes(ems);                 /* called to exercise the function */
;;;793    	rs274ngc_active_settings(sets);               /* called to exercise the function */
;;;794    	rs274ngc_exit();                              /* saves parameters */
;;;795    	return(status);
;;;796    /*	exit(status);*/
;;;797    /******************************RS274/NGC源码的main函数结束******************************/
;;;798    /*	while(1)
;;;799    	{	
;;;800    		if(USART_GetFlagStatus(USART1,USART_IT_RXNE)==SET)
;;;801    		{

;;;803    			printf("  %c",i&0xFF);
;;;804    					
;;;805    		}
;;;806    	}*/
;;;807    }
0000a0  b021              ADD      sp,sp,#0x84
0000a2  e8bd83f0          POP      {r4-r9,pc}
                  |L10.166|
0000a6  2c03              CMP      r4,#3                 ;735
0000a8  d109              BNE      |L10.190|
0000aa  a032              ADR      r0,|L10.372|
0000ac  f7fffffe          BL       read_tool_file
0000b0  b108              CBZ      r0,|L10.182|
0000b2  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;738
0000b4  e7f4              B        |L10.160|
                  |L10.182|
0000b6  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;740
0000ba  4680              MOV      r8,r0                 ;740
0000bc  e7c4              B        |L10.72|
                  |L10.190|
0000be  2c04              CMP      r4,#4                 ;742
0000c0  d107              BNE      |L10.210|
0000c2  b916              CBNZ     r6,|L10.202|
0000c4  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;743
0000c8  e001              B        |L10.206|
                  |L10.202|
0000ca  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0                 ;743
                  |L10.206|
0000ce  4606              MOV      r6,r0                 ;743
0000d0  e7ba              B        |L10.72|
                  |L10.210|

0000da  4638              MOV      r0,r7                 ;745
0000dc  f7fffffe          BL       adjust_error_handling
0000e0  e7b2              B        |L10.72|
                  |L10.226|

0000e6  482c              LDR      r0,|L10.408|

0000f0  d105              BNE      |L10.254|
0000f2  a05b              ADR      r0,|L10.608|

0000fc  e7d0              B        |L10.160|
                  |L10.254|

000100  d111              BNE      |L10.294|

000106  a15c              ADR      r1,|L10.632|
000108  f7fffffe          BL       fopen
00010c  491c              LDR      r1,|L10.384|
00010e  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]            ;757  ; _outfile
000110  4608              MOV      r0,r1                 ;758
000112  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;758  ; _outfile
000114  b938              CBNZ     r0,|L10.294|
000116  68a8              LDR      r0,[r5,#8]            ;760
000118  4602              MOV      r2,r0                 ;760

                  |L10.294|

00012e  d005              BEQ      |L10.316|

000132  9901              LDR      r1,[sp,#4]            ;768
000134  f7fffffe          BL       report_error
000138  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;769
00013a  e7b1              B        |L10.160|
                  |L10.316|
00013c  4630              MOV      r0,r6                 ;774
00013e  9901              LDR      r1,[sp,#4]            ;774
000140  f7fffffe          BL       interpret_from_keyboard
000144  4681              MOV      r9,r0                 ;774
000146  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_line_length
00014a  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_sequence_number
00014e  a813              ADD      r0,sp,#0x4c           ;791
000150  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_active_g_codes
000154  a80c              ADD      r0,sp,#0x30           ;792
000156  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_active_m_codes
00015a  a806              ADD      r0,sp,#0x18           ;793
00015c  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_active_settings
000160  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_exit
000164  4648              MOV      r0,r9                 ;795
000166  e79b              B        |L10.160|
;;;808    
                          ENDP

                          AREA ||i.read_tool_file||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  read_tool_file PROC
;;;361    
;;;362    int read_tool_file(                               /* ARGUMENTS         */
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;363    char * file_name)                                 /* name of tool file */
;;;364    {
000002  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;365    //    FILE * tool_file_port;
;;;366    //    char buffer[1000];
;;;367    		int slot;
;;;368    //    int tool_id;
;;;369    //    double offset;
;;;370    //    double diameter;
;;;371    //
;;;372    //    if (file_name[0] IS 0)                        /* ask for name if given name is empty string */
;;;373    //    {
;;;374    //        fprintf(stderr, "name of tool file => ");
;;;375    //        gets(buffer);
;;;376    //        tool_file_port SET_TO fopen(buffer, "r");
;;;377    //    }
;;;378    //    else
;;;379    //        tool_file_port SET_TO fopen(file_name, "r");
;;;380    //    if (tool_file_port IS NULL)
;;;381    //    {
;;;382    //        fprintf(stderr, "Cannot open %s\r\n",
;;;383    //            ((file_name[0] IS 0) ? buffer : file_name));
;;;384    //        return 1;
;;;385    //    }
;;;386    //    for(;;)                                       /* read and discard header, checking for blank line */
;;;387    //    {
;;;388    //        if (fgets(buffer, 1000, tool_file_port) IS NULL)
;;;389    //        {
;;;390    //            fprintf(stderr, "Bad tool file format\r\n");
;;;391    //            return 1;
;;;392    //        }
;;;393    //        else if (buffer[0] IS '\n')
;;;394    //            break;
;;;395    //    }
;;;396    //
;;;397    //    for (slot SET_TO 0; slot <= _tool_max; slot++)/* initialize */
;;;398    //    {
;;;399    //        _tools[slot].id SET_TO -1;
;;;400    //        _tools[slot].length SET_TO 0;
;;;401    //        _tools[slot].diameter SET_TO 0;
;;;402    //    }
;;;403    //    for (; (fgets(buffer, 1000, tool_file_port) ISNT NULL); )
;;;404    //    {
;;;405    //        if (sscanf(buffer, "%d %d %lf %lf", &slot,
;;;406    //            &tool_id, &offset, &diameter) < 4)
;;;407    //        {
;;;408    //            fprintf(stderr, "Bad input line \"%s\" in tool file\r\n", buffer);
;;;409    //            return 1;
;;;410    //        }
;;;411    //        if ((slot < 0) OR (slot > _tool_max))     /* zero and max both OK */
;;;412    //        {
;;;413    //            fprintf(stderr, "Out of range tool slot number %d\r\n", slot);
;;;414    //            return 1;
;;;415    //        }
;;;416    //        _tools[slot].id SET_TO tool_id;
;;;417    //        _tools[slot].length SET_TO offset;
;;;418    //        _tools[slot].diameter SET_TO diameter;
;;;419    	    for (slot SET_TO 0; slot <= _tool_max; slot++)/* initialize */
000004  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
000008  4601              MOV      r1,r0
00000a  e018              B        |L11.62|
                  |L11.12|
;;;420    	    {
;;;421    	        _tools[slot].id SET_TO -1;
00000c  f04f30ff          MOV      r0,#0xffffffff
000010  eb010341          ADD      r3,r1,r1,LSL #1
000014  4c15              LDR      r4,|L11.108|
000016  f8440033          STR      r0,[r4,r3,LSL #3]
;;;422    	        _tools[slot].length SET_TO 0;
00001a  f04f0300          MOV      r3,#0
00001e  eb010441          ADD      r4,r1,r1,LSL #1
000022  4d12              LDR      r5,|L11.108|
000024  eb0504c4          ADD      r4,r5,r4,LSL #3
000028  60a3              STR      r3,[r4,#8]
00002a  60e3              STR      r3,[r4,#0xc]
;;;423    	        _tools[slot].diameter SET_TO 0;
00002c  eb010441          ADD      r4,r1,r1,LSL #1
000030  eb0504c4          ADD      r4,r5,r4,LSL #3
000034  6123              STR      r3,[r4,#0x10]
000036  6163              STR      r3,[r4,#0x14]
000038  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;419
00003c  4601              MOV      r1,r0                 ;419
                  |L11.62|
00003e  480c              LDR      r0,|L11.112|
000040  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]            ;419  ; _tool_max
000042  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;419
000044  dde2              BLE      |L11.12|
;;;424    	    }
;;;425    
;;;426            _tools[5].id SET_TO 5;
000046  f04f0005          MOV      r0,#5
00004a  4b08              LDR      r3,|L11.108|
00004c  6798              STR      r0,[r3,#0x78]  ; _tools
;;;427            _tools[5].length SET_TO 1.5;
00004e  f04f0400          MOV      r4,#0
000052  4b08              LDR      r3,|L11.116|
000054  4805              LDR      r0,|L11.108|
000056  f1000078          ADD      r0,r0,#0x78
00005a  e9c04302          STRD     r4,r3,[r0,#8]
;;;428            _tools[5].diameter SET_TO 0.25;
00005e  4b06              LDR      r3,|L11.120|
000060  e9c04304          STRD     r4,r3,[r0,#0x10]
;;;429    
;;;430    //    }
;;;431    //    fclose(tool_file_port);
;;;432        return 0;
000064  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
;;;433    }
000068  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;434    
                          ENDP

00006a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L11.108|
                          DCD      _tools
                  |L11.112|
                          DCD      _tool_max
                  |L11.116|
                          DCD      0x3ff80000
                  |L11.120|
                          DCD      0x3fd00000

                          AREA ||i.report_error||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          REQUIRE _printf_percent
                          REQUIRE _printf_s
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                          REQUIRE _printf_str
                  report_error PROC
;;;87     
;;;88     void report_error(                                /* ARGUMENTS                            */
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;89     int error_code,                                   /* the code number of the error message */
;;;90     int print_stack)                                  /* print stack if ON, otherwise not     */
;;;91     {
000002  b0c0              SUB      sp,sp,#0x100
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;92         char buffer[RS274NGC_TEXT_SIZE];
;;;93         int k;
;;;94     
;;;95         rs274ngc_error_text(error_code, buffer, 5);   /* for coverage of code */
000008  f04f0205          MOV      r2,#5
00000c  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00000e  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000010  f7fffffe          BL       rs274ngc_error_text
;;;96         rs274ngc_error_text(error_code, buffer, RS274NGC_TEXT_SIZE);
000014  f44f7280          MOV      r2,#0x100
000018  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00001a  4630              MOV      r0,r6
